pageContent: Background: This pilot randomized controlled trial (RCT) examined the clinical effects of 2 complementary (CAM) therapies, relaxation response therapy (RRT) and Reiki therapy, in men being treated with external beam radiotherapy (EBRx) for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Historical prostate cancer screening and treatment outcomes from a single institution
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22537761/
